author: Scott Harris
title: Why Delaying UFC 249 Makes Sense for Both UFC and Dana White
description: With the coronavirus tightening its vice grip on the whole of humanity, we’re all re-learning that there are some things we simply can't outrun...
content:
UFC president Dana WhiteJohn Locher/Associated Press
With the coronavirus tightening its vice grip on the whole of humanity, were all re-learning that there are some things we simply can't outrun. That applies in its own way to the tiny world of mixed martia… [+8641 chars]
